analysis.description:
Reentrancy in MDICOStage2.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/43/0xa31300e9ab3e13c5b4ce218af13db23b3c6ec804.sol#564-575):
	External calls:
	- token.icoInvestment(msg.sender,itokens) (/unique_chucks/43/0xa31300e9ab3e13c5b4ce218af13db23b3c6ec804.sol)
	External calls sending eth:
	- forwardFunds() (/unique_chucks/43/0xa31300e9ab3e13c5b4ce218af13db23b3c6ec804.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- endAt (/unique_chucks/43/0xa31300e9ab3e13c5b4ce218af13db23b3c6ec804.sol)
	- state (/unique_chucks/43/0xa31300e9ab3e13c5b4ce218af13db23b3c6ec804.sol)

Reentrancy in MDICOStage2.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/43/0xa31300e9ab3e13c5b4ce218af13db23b3c6ec804.sol#564-575):
	External calls:
	- token.icoInvestment(msg.sender,itokens) (/unique_chucks/43/0xa31300e9ab3e13c5b4ce218af13db23b3c6ec804.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- collectedWei (/unique_chucks/43/0xa31300e9ab3e13c5b4ce218af13db23b3c6ec804.sol)

MDICOStage2.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/43/0xa31300e9ab3e13c5b4ce218af13db23b3c6ec804.sol#564-575) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.icoInvestment(msg.sender,itokens) (/unique_chucks/43/0xa31300e9ab3e13c5b4ce218af13db23b3c6ec804.sol)

BaseICO.start (/unique_chucks/43/0xa31300e9ab3e13c5b4ce218af13db23b3c6ec804.sol#415-425) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(endAt_ > block.timestamp && state == State.Inactive) (/unique_chucks/43/0xa31300e9ab3e13c5b4ce218af13db23b3c6ec804.sol#416-418)

BaseICO.tune (/unique_chucks/43/0xa31300e9ab3e13c5b4ce218af13db23b3c6ec804.sol#459-486) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- endAt_ > block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/43/0xa31300e9ab3e13c5b4ce218af13db23b3c6ec804.sol#469-471)

MDICOStage2.touch (/unique_chucks/43/0xa31300e9ab3e13c5b4ce218af13db23b3c6ec804.sol#553-563) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= endAt (/unique_chucks/43/0xa31300e9ab3e13c5b4ce218af13db23b3c6ec804.sol#559-563)

MDICOStage2.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/43/0xa31300e9ab3e13c5b4ce218af13db23b3c6ec804.sol#564-575) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(state == State.Active && block.timestamp <= endAt && msg.value >= lowCapTxWei && msg.value <= hardCapTxWei && collectedWei + msg.value <= hardCapWei && whitelisted(msg.sender)) (/unique_chucks/43/0xa31300e9ab3e13c5b4ce218af13db23b3c6ec804.sol#564-575)

elements.expression: require(bool)(state == State.Active && block.timestamp <= endAt && msg.value >= lowCapTxWei && msg.value <= hardCapTxWei && collectedWei + msg.value <= hardCapWei && whitelisted(msg.sender))

analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/43/0xa31300e9ab3e13c5b4ce218af13db23b3c6ec804.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/43/0xa31300e9ab3e13c5b4ce218af13db23b3c6ec804.sol#1): it allows old versions
MDICOStage2.ONE_TOKEN (/unique_chucks/43/0xa31300e9ab3e13c5b4ce218af13db23b3c6ec804.sol#519-520) is never used in MDICOStage2
